Articles.Content:
Hi!

Im an hobby astronomer, and so I feel it almost in my daily duty to watch the APOD (Astronomy Picture Of the Day).

But when I came by today, I watched the video posted and my first thought was "Oh my, did I leave KSP in the task bar opened?"

If you watch it, Im sure you will have deja vu

http://apod.nasa.gov/apod/ap130618.html

Robert
